name: Promise Promise (a FE:fates fangame)
description:
A Fire Emblem Fates fangame based around the pairing Niles/m!Corrin !

A very small VN where instead of writing a fic i wanted to make this.... Literally just wanted to draw sprites and cgs. A very self-indulgent, cute, sweet story that'll take a few minutes to finish ! I hope you enjoy !

Kamuzero fans, this is for you !!!! 

♡
